altername_name: Chikudenya Toubee: BIT2 no Kubikiri Yakata Yori
name: Chikudenya Toubei: Kubikiri Yakata Yori
overview: Chikudenya Toubee: Kubikiri Yakata Yori is an Digital comic Adventure game. The player plays as a "ronin" (a samurai without a master) assassin-for-hire as he struggles to survive his most dangerous mission yet. The player uses a menu of commands to interact with the world. This is a story-driven game that also includes puzzles and cutscenes (as automatic comic pages) for critical parts of the story. This game is entirely in Japanese language and is intended for mature audiences.
